name: DayNightSwitch
description:
Game developed by topaz for the Trijam#164.

It's my first time uploading this game jam.

I develop this game in 2 hours and 50 min.

HOW TO PLAY

You can control day and night situation. when day time, you could see red objects( including ground and needle), during red objects appear but black object is hidden.

X : switch day and night

Right and Left Arrow : move Right and Left

Space : Jump

There is a goal in the stage, try to find and touch it !
